pkgmetadata.longdescription: lpschedule-generator====================Python package that enables the FSF_ to write the LibrePlanet_schedule in Markdown_.See "Installation_" to get started... _Installation: https://ricketyspace.net/lpschedule-generator/install.. _FSF: https://fsf.org.. _LibrePlanet: https://libreplanet.org/conference.. _Markdown: https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown
